website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling queen wooden slat and steel bed frame was created to lull problem sleepers into dreamland — without the squeaks that plague similar models.
pros: Can use with memory foam mattresses
Frame and mattress both stay in place without slipping
Plastic caps on the feet protect wooden floors
Legs fold so bed can be moved around easily
A single person can assemble frame in a short period of time
cons: No holes to attach a headboard
Some users report having to sand down slats before installation to prevent splinters

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple months it was perfect and I had no issues, but that's not the case anymore. Yeah it's a solid frame that can hold a significant amount of weight, but the thing is just so wobbly now. Every time you shift and move, the bed frame will sway with you. No bed frame should ever have this much lateral movement, it feels like the legs will snap off any night.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and seems to be built well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Shipped fast and everything was intact. Comes with everything you need even the tools. It's a bit higher than expected but it does have good storage! Light weight frame and perfect for my kid. Oh..and the instructions were very straightforward
customer_reviews.author: GANBATEKUDASAI

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy, no broken wood pieces
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and been sleeping on it for a week now. Here are the pros and cons of this. Pros: Its sturdy, no broken wood pieces. Easy to Assemble, says takes 40 minutes to assemble but once you look over the instructions it took me 10-15. Metal Frame and 2 support beams help make it so the bed doesn't collapse. If any of the boards break they're cheap to replace. Cons: Bed slides around on the boards a bit sometimes, always adjusting it before bed. A little noisy at the foot sometimes. Purchase this with the Zinus Memory Foam 8-10 inch, I have the 12 and its way high.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great design. Photo included...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect queen sized bed base for our Tempurpedic mattress. It does not squeak or make a sound. I put it together myself with no problems. (I luv assembling stuff.) There is no slipping, the frame doesn't move, nor does the mattress. Both stay in place. The feet have pads & the many legs are really supportive, & there's no middle bar down the center, yay. The slots are nicely spaced, not too wide or small. The wood slats are nice. I took a photo before we put the mattress on. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Gyrl

customer_reviews.title: Ruins your floors, squeaks, crap
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves zero stars. The feet were silently damaged over about a year of use and the plastic feet were essentially cut through by the sheet metal foot posts. The posts then began to dig into and have now completely ruined (1/2 inch deep square gouges) six different places in our floor. Absolutely do not buy this garbage, you're going to spend more money repairing your floor than you will save on this crap bed. Further, it squeaks terribly after a few months. (Yes, it's put together correctly. I'm an engineer, I checked)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way Better Than the All-Metal Version!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried an all-metal version of this base and it didn't even come close to this version with wooden slats. It's so quiet and shock absorbent. The all metal base broke within a few months of purchase; the thin welded metal strips snapped off and a year later the thicker support bars were busted in half. This version holds our mattress in place while the other version seemed to constantly push our mattress around. We have only had this product for a week, but it has proven more that sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Haley L.

customer_reviews.title: The bed frame was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: purchased this item on May 28th, it arrived June 2nd, and was put together on June 3rd. The bed frame was very easy to put together. In putting the wooden slats together, we noticed that two of the slats had weak points, and minor cracks. We put them on the bed frame just the same. Four days latter, the slats cracked after sitting on the bed. Make sure you check the quality of the wooden slats, before putting the bed together. The bed frame and slats came well packaged and protected, I just think the wood was old, and not as sturdy as the other slats.
customer_reviews.author: woodpapr

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put together but definitely not silent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has storage space underneath and we do not want to headboard for our I bought this because it have storage space underneath and we do not want a headboard for bed. It works OK and assembling it wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. However, it is definitely not silent. It makes all kinds of squeaking and honking sounds. We thought maybe we didn't tighten the screws down enough, so used an impact driver to make them really tight. It made no difference. I will keep this bed frame because the storage is nice, but don't expect a silent bed.
customer_reviews.author: BudgiePudgie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is my third zinnus bed platform and my last. Every one I have bought has been discontinued a short time later. They get flimsier and more difficult to assemble each time. The allen wrench failed a third the way through, also stripping some of the bolt heads. The slats are thinner, the framing is very much thinner and it was a pain in the ass to assemble. I guess I'm repeating myself. If it doesn't shake or move in the night I might add a star of two but don't hold your breath.
customer_reviews.author: Uh-oh!

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my floor.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the for about a year and it squeaked extremely bad after that time. The middle support under the bed has bent from sliding slightly every now and then. And the leg is not going to save your floors. This left giant gashes in my floor. I love the idea of this product but the application and execution is poor at best. I think it would be better on carpet but I am extremely dissatisfied with how my floor now looks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beauty sleep!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference. I cannot believe I waited so long to get rid of the box spring. My daughters bed had a crappy metal frame and I purchased some metal reenforcements from Amazon to support the box spring and stop the squeaking, but that was a waste of money and time. I finally gave up and just bought this and hoped for the best. It was so easy to assemble, it's not really heavy and what a difference it makes! No box spring and no squeaking and she slept like a baby! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: clever1

customer_reviews.title: I'm literally in love with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I've been sleeping on a mattress on the floor for about 2 1/2 years now, and I forgot how nice it is to have a real bed. I don't think I could go back! This bed is amazing. I don't have a boxspring so I needed a specific type of frame, and this was the cheapest I found. Wow, this thing is a great value though. It was super easy to assemble, and the 14 inches height means there's plenty of space for boxes and such underneath. I'm literally in love with this bed. Highly highly HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Great for "Adult" fun! Storage and quality are a bonus.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this frame for over a month and we have done many things on it, many times. Sometimes twice in one night. Anyway, there's no squeaking and no shaking. This thing is very solid and has handled all of our "Adult" activities like a champ. Would definitely recommend for a good time. As a bonus, we are able to store a lot of bins underneath with plenty of room to spare. It took less than an hour to assemble with two people. We have a memory foam bed on it and the distance between the slats seems to fit it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: WAZCO

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I'm writing this review with my nine year old who is saying to start this out with... first off it has no structure lol funny but seriously do not buy this bag for a child that may be playful because the legs are constantly folding slightly, very wobbly. As a 27 year old woman who put this and a different metal bed together the assembly was a tad more tedious as far as the wood pieces go. The quality is nice but I just dont really like it compared to other beds our home.
customer_reviews.author: James Tynes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy/very Affordable! If you put it together the correct way!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 50 year old woman with arthritis in my hands and I put this thing together in no time. I don’t know why I am seeing bad reviews about this wonderful bed frame. It’s pretty perfect! Some people just don’t like following directions so maybe that’s the problem. Yes, it was quick and easy to assemble. My 13 year old son assisted me but I could have easily done it alone. Since it was for him I figured he ought to help out! If it’s rickety then it’s your fault you did something wrong. Take it apart and start over.
customer_reviews.author: Dorcia White-Brake

customer_reviews.title: Another Surprise From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit when I opened the box and saw all the parts staring back at me, I was very intimidated. I have never put something like that together, and really wasnt looking forward to doing so, but since I needed to have a place to sleep, I decided to start building. At first, the directions made no sense, because I was panicking, looking at all the parts. But I put on Andy Griffith and it only took me about an hour to get it all together. They literally give you every tool you need to build the frame, and the directions are really easy. It shipped quick. I had no problems with delivery. Very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Twin size is a disaster!
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. The twin size frame is not stable at all, and it sways with every single move made in the bed. I'm really concerned one of the legs will crack and send my kid tumbling to the floor. I wish I would have taken my money, set it on fire, and saved myself the trouble of putting this piece of you-know-what together, because that would have been a better use of my time and energy. I now have to purchase another frame and throw this one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelieachelie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and good value frame
customer_reviews.text: Guest room bed needed new frame. This one was extremely easy to assemble with two people. It is sturdy enough for intended use, but I wouldn't suggest it for heavy use. One thing that was a little weird is that there isn't a leg in the corner, so it can get a little tippy if you sit on the corner. I like that it has tape to hold the mattress in place so it doesn't slide all over but wonder how long it will last. It does make changing the sheets difficult. The wooden slats are wide enough and close enough together that there is no mattress sag. Overall I like this frame and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Stubbed Toes!
customer_reviews.text: No support posts on the corners! No more stubbed toes! More parts than the typical frame but still easy to assemble. I put all parts together with bolts in not quite snug. Then tightened all bots once all parts aligned. Slates are wood, wide and close enough that I don’t need a box spring base. Which is good because I have a 15” mattress. Mattress + base is perfect height for me. The lack of post on the corner meant I couldn’t attach my headboard. Luckily my headboard is freestanding. Check yours before you buy if that might be an issue. Under storage is good. 14 gallon Rubbermaid tote fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wade M McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically the foundation looks fine, however the wooden slats are flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 230Ibs and have the Full size version of this foundation. The 14 wooden slats sag allowing the middle bar to be felt through my new mattress (12 inch Sealy Posturepedic Diego Full Firm Tight Top Mattress). I might use liquid nail to attach 14 2x4x54" studs above and onto the existing flimsy 3/8 thick wooden slats. Hopefully that works assuming the Zinus warranty is no good. I purchased this items 5 months ago so I won't be able to return it. This isn't an easy type of item to return anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanve

customer_reviews.title: Safe for toes, sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My toes are attracted to hard surfaces. While I loved the look of the frames with the legs in the corners, I know better. This frame is easy to put together, especially with an attachment to my screwdriver matching the holes in the screws. Fast Fast Well designed, sturdy, and comfortable. A headboard cannot be attached to this frame. My frame is attached the wall. There are no-skid, rubber floor protectors to keep the bed in place.
customer_reviews.author: uncommon_boston

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This frame didn't last 6 months before breaking at the middle support leg in the middle. Which caused the mattress to fall to the ground. I tried to warranty it but since it was broken and needed an entire new frame. I trashed it which I had to since my son needed a way to sleep and we needed to put the mattress on the floor. They said without pictures of the defect they could do nothing. It's was very inexpensive and got what I paid for a piece of junk. Now we had another inexpensive one prior but it lasted over 3 years which was fine.
customer_reviews.author: wes simpson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don't move it.
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I owned a wire base for our queen bed. It was sufficient until I wanted a King sized bed. Upon moving the Queen, I noticed the wire base was busted at certain points. For this reason, I purchased the wood slat base. I have to assume that wire bases will continue to fail. In the end: This steel base will take you an hour or two to put together. You will also leave it in place after you put it together. Don't buy this base if you want to move in the near future. It is difficult to take apart and will not pack handily.
customer_reviews.author: E Summers

customer_reviews.title: This includes happiness the box, I mean it!
customer_reviews.text: Usually i dont care much at all about the extras but they include a little wrench that makes setting it up soooooo much easier then the normal hex wrench, im putting that cute little wrench in my tool box! On top of that they include some thank you cards and stuff that you can mail, not branded on the front that you can write in and actually mail out, they are high quality and cute. I opened it and as soon as i saw these two things i literally built it up with a smile on my face. On top of that it only took like 20 minutes to set up and fits my bed perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Good support, Breeze to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a year and a half. It comes with setup instructions, but was intuitive and very easy to set up without referencing the instructions. If you pay for "expert assembly" you will regret paying for that expertise. It is a solid base, but I don't do gymnastics on it. Your mileage may vary. It is high enough for standard laundry baskets to slide under it. It is incredibly affordable. Only downside is the side supports are at the perimeter, and I have occasionally found them with a toe. (pipe insulation from your local hardware store helps that immensely.) I have it topped with "Zinus 8 Inch Memory Foam Queen Mattress"
customer_reviews.author: THA D IN A-TOWN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it has been nothing but issues. Seller decided to ship it USPS and I don't know why. Originally USPS wouldn't deliver and when they finally did box was torn and beat up. Finally got the bed frame and we were missing a part and had an extra part. I had to make shift my own part. When it was finally all together I don't like it like I thought I would, too tall. The only reason I didn't return it was size. How do I even go about returning something so big. I just took the financial hit and live with a bed frame I don't like. Dont make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: SO UPSET
customer_reviews.text: This thing is WOBBLY and TOO SHORT TO FIT FULL SIZED STORAGE TUBS. I had to buy additional bed risers which are super expensive for the number of legs on the frame. THE WORST PART is that the only Zinus headboard brackets I could find that indicated it was for this size frame(the 14”) arrived and DONT MATCH UP THE THE FRAME. Yet another cost down the drain— including the over hundred dollar headboard I also bought from Zinus and can’t attach to my Zinus frame. I AM SO UPSET!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: good product, slight design ehnancement to make it a 5
customer_reviews.text: good product, would give it a 5 star rating but issue with tucking sheet in at the bottom. Because there is just a bar & gap between the first wood slat, the sheet bottom does stay securely tucked in like a standard box spring or platform (slightest tug causes the sheet to come out at the foot). Design suggestion, at the foot of the bed, have the first wood slat be about 6 inch (or more) wide - to allow for more secure sheet tuck-in.....
customer_reviews.author: dxpaap

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bed frame would be at least decent but it was crappy from the start. The wooden slats are flawed. More than half of the ones I got for my twin size frame were cracked along the grain or chipped. Ended up in the trash. Also it was very squeaky and annoying. I ended up buying an air mattress and just set it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Izzie

customer_reviews.title: Scratched wood floors, squeaked after a few months and then a leg fell off.
customer_reviews.text: [Additional update - after two years of user one of the legs of the bed broke off where it was welded. Don’t buy this product. It doesn’t last long, squeaks, and damages floors.] I am so disappointed - the other reviews said that the bed didn't squeak. It began to squeak only months into using it (with no "heavy usage") the supports for the beds scratched my wood floors to shreds, and you can feel that it's higher in the middle and sags on the two sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creaks, wears down fast and scratches hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for two years. do not recommend for hardwood floors...IT will either slide all around because you need to put grips on the bottom avoid it scratching the floor (learned that lesson) Or do not but the grips on and deal with floor scratch. Also no matter how tight you screw everything in you may experience it creaking...
customer_reviews.author: we all have needs

customer_reviews.title: Center Bar
customer_reviews.text: The center bar makes it uncomfortable. I have a thinner mattress. That improved somewhat by adding an extra foam cushion. Use a thick mattress. The leg positioning is great! I haven't stubbed a toe! It also seems to be quite sturdy. And, the sticky stuff used to keep the mattress stable works well. I haven't lost a pillow between the mattress and headboard. Nor has it moved over the side edge.
customer_reviews.author: God Dan

customer_reviews.title: Quality of life upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This bed base was easy to assemble single handedly. It has withheld the weight of a memory foam mattress, two adults at almost 200 lbs, and two cats. Has plenty of space underneath. I have had this base for. Roughly two months, and we have noticed that some f the slats make noise when getting in and out of bed. We have removed the mattress to check to insure that install was correct, nothing was found but sadly creak remains.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS THE BEST PURCHASE THAT I HAVE MADE ON AMAZON! I’m 25 years old and not very strong, but was able to assemble this in under 2 hours by myself with the tools provided. It’s noiseless, really easy to follow instructions, and overall just beautiful. I am super super pleased. I have a full bed with a mattress and topper and this fit perfectly. Very durable and sturdy and my bed is perfect now. I am in love! Also, the cute little cards they sent with the purchase was heartwarming. Thank you Zinnus!!
customer_reviews.author: taabish n.

customer_reviews.title: Setup was fairly easy and the bed seems to be sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Setup was fairly easy and the bed seems to be sturdy enough. Two Concerns: 1. The legs/feet are quite narrow and I was worried about damage to the rug it was placed on. I went to Lowes hardware and bought small plates to put under the legs and spread the weight distribution around. 2. The wooden slats are spaced a bit further apart than I would like. I am concerned that the Zinus 12 inch memory foam mattress will suffer from sagging or some other issue related to the spacing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is a pretty good item, especially for the price. I’ve been using it for a few months without issue. Only two complaints - first complaint is that the mattress slides off of it a bit at the bottom over time. I need to push the mattress back up onto it about once a month. Second complaint is that there does not appear to be a way to mechanically attach my headboard to it, so my headboard is just sort of resting behind this frame, leaning against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Inman

customer_reviews.title: IMPECCABLE design AFFORABLE price
customer_reviews.text: Moving into my new apartment was a great experience mainly due to ZINUS and this impeccably engineered design. I have been shopping around for pretty decorative frames and due to my indecision I bought this because of necessity then the afforable price and sleek design. I am not replacing this bed, out of sheer respect for a great design. It is nice to see & experience the new innovative concepts on the basic platform frame, this is very sturdy, the legs have a smooth connection to the floor surface (no straching or skreeching when moving the frame for making the bed, and assembly time was 10 minutes, and storage galore underneath. Thanks ZINUS for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Deschenes

customer_reviews.title: Minimal and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is a minimal look. I like that you cant really tell its even there. It seems durable and doesnt squeak at all. I weigh 175 lbs and my daughters sleep with me, they each weigh 40 lbs. My mattress is a relatively heavy, its a king sized memory foam mattress. It took me less than an hour to put together with my children messing with all the parts. The pictures made the instructions easier but there are no written instructions at all. So pay attention to the pictures and which way things are facing. Lovely so far. I will update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: ljiljana bozickovic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to attach a headboard. No brackets fit this.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty study bed, but don't buy it if you want to attach a headboard. Because the legs are so far from the corners, no headboard bracket will work with the frame. I am very disappointed after trying different bracket adapters. If Zinus sells a bed like this, they should make it so a headboard will fit. Make sure you see the disclaimer at the bottom of the ad blurb, where they say a headboard can't be used with this bed frame: they don't mean they don't make one to fit, they really mean NO headboard can be fit to this.
customer_reviews.author: ringztrue

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, makes no noise when sitting or sleeping great storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this platform bed! Super easy to assemble Instructions were easy to follow Love the height for storage and with the mattress my 12 yo daughter feels like she’s sleeping in a princess bed. My only complaint (probably my own clumsiness) is how many times I’ve nailed my toes on the “legs” I did end up keeping the styrofoam from the packaging and I wrapped it around the two corners where I was nailing my toes even though this is my daughters bedroom she says that she’s not had any issues with that
customer_reviews.author: Mollis mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quite and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bed platform for my purple mattress that wasn't gonna be hundreds of dollars. Easy to assemble, and no squeaking so far. Its nice to have so much extra vertical space under the bed compared to a box spring. Also i did not peel off the stick tape on the two wood slates that prevent the mattress from moving. My purple mattress is about 70 pounds and so far i haven't had a issue with my mattress moving.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed frame! Best DIY furniture ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've put together a lot of cheap furniture, struggled through incoherent and incomplete instructions, missing or ill-fitting parts, and products that just weren't worth the cost in time and money. But this bed rocks! I was extremely impressed with how well packaged the parts were, and the inclusion of spare hardware and a tool you're urged to save for adjustments in the future. The company included a lovely note and three note cards (I think it was supposed to be one), with the encouragement to send it on to someone you love. I'm very impressed by the people of Zinus. The frame works great with my Tempurpedic mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie Todd

customer_reviews.title: Splintering wood. Silent frame at the cost of total durability.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my Tuft and needle double size mattress. Pros: Very easy to build Light weight Zero noise. Plasic plank holders that eliminate any sound between planks and frame Cons: Slpintered cheap wood... I hate this Cheap wood that will undoubtedly break with time. Other reviews have had their wood crack and break the first day. Not that I need to but jumping on my mattress would almost guarantee planks breaking. I've had zero issue with this frame in the first week thst is why it passes with three starts but I will not recommend it! Not with this cheap splitting wood. I will update if any major events happen.
customer_reviews.author: Delete

customer_reviews.title: Great frame!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this was so easy to assemble! All tools included and spare parts marked as spare parts, not extras that leave you to wonder where you forgot to put a bolt! We or it together in about 20 minutes, which is much better than other platform beds I've put together. The center support is the same as the other legs, I do not fear this breaking. Everything was packaged well and the directions were way to follow. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cindy skelton

customer_reviews.title: Great for rough kids
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a VERY sturdy bed. I put it together myself. It took a little bit, but assembly was fairly easy. I bought this bed for my almost 3-year-old son who has sensory issues and is a JUMPER. He crashes, bangs, jumps, and smashes into anything and everything, and literally bent the metal frame on his toddler bed. This thing seems much more solid. I'm using a foam mattress on it, and it's pretty firm, but not uncomfortable at all. I've fallen asleep on it myself, as has my husband, and we're both fairly large adults. After trying this type of frame, I'm done with traditional box springs.
customer_reviews.author: A.Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, good for the price. Gets the mattress off the ground without looking too industrial. Assembly was pretty simple considering all the parts and pieces. There’s four side pieces which you join at the corners, two support braces, secure the legs with screws and pop in the slats. Slats seem better quality than IKEA bedframes I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to accommodate our Casper mattress, which is has done well. However, 8 months in and there is a definite "weeker weeker weeker" noise when we climb in and out of bed... and during other times. This just started happening the past month. Before that, it was great! Not sure what's up with the horrible squeak since we are average sized people and don't jump on our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kbish

customer_reviews.title: Very tall!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, I didn't realize that it was a "box spring replacement". With our mattress and box spring on top, our bed is extremely tall. It's a very well made platform, and I would recommend it for that purpose. Not sure that I would recommend that anyone not use a box spring, though! We are going to cut the legs down a few inches so that our bed is at a more accessible height. There will still be plenty of room for storage underneath. I do feel a bit silly for not realizing how tall this would make our bed, but, c'est la vie, luckily for me my man is very handy ;)
customer_reviews.author: Stella Yo

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It has been a long time since I put together a platform bed and the design of this one is amazing I was just like they've made this so easy! I love the tools and it was fast assembly maybe an hour (with a 4 and 5 year old distracting me). It is perfect for my office/spare bedroom. The 14 inch height is going to be so great for storage! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! The only thing I don’t care for is that the only way for the mattress to not move is to stick it to the frame with two of the slats. They had stickers on it for that purpose. I chose not to do it and honestly, the mattress doesn’t move much anyways. Super sturdy. Doesn’t make any sounds when we’re on the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Migita

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended if you want silence
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that seem too good to be true. It has a great price and is simple as it should be. Also very easy to assembly. During the first 4 months, I had it, it was awesome. Sturdy and silent. However, after 4 months of use, it became so squeaky that I had to get rid of it. I even tried to add padding to all joints to see if it would help and it did. For one or two days. After the two days, all the noises were back and I gave up. It would make noises with the simplest movement.
customer_reviews.author: tucaz

customer_reviews.title: Completely silent during sex
customer_reviews.text: Completely silent during sex. Thats what you really wanted to know, anyways. Its sturdy and wont wake the neighbors. Assembly is super easy, but I recommend putting fender washers between each bolt and the bed frame. If you dont, you might squish the metal before feeling like you have a secure connection. Or maybe dont crank it down so hard. Or use loctite. Idk.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together!  Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my adult daughter. She didn't have a boxspring, and was using a frame without support...it just drooped in two spots. We put it together today. It was incredibly simple to put together. It took about 15 minutes taking our time. The wood slats were solid and everything fit perfectly into the slots and holes. Well worth it. Now she can sleep without back pain. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Equus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old box spring with our memory foam mattress. I put this frame together by myself, in about 45 minutes. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I placed some adhesive floor protectors underneath all the feet as I built it to help protect our hardwood floors. I was able to use my old bed skirt with this too. As others have stated, there is no easy way to attach a headboard if you want to. Standard headboards attach at the corner legs, and the legs for this frame are inset from the corners by about 12 inches. If you made a custom headboard it's do-able with some creative trips to a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: Garbage materials
customer_reviews.text: "you get what you pay for" has never applied more then it does with this frame. It hasn't even been two months and one of the metal legs broke, torn right at it's welding point. A second leg became permanently bent at an angle. There's no traction whatsoever. It was put on a wooden floor and every time you get on it it just slides around. I wish I would've just give to Ikea, to begin with, like I had to do yesterday when this piece of garbage broke.
customer_reviews.author: Odd

customer_reviews.title: Small Toe Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Was halfway easy to understand instructions and the bed frame is sturdy. Plus we can fit lots of storage under the bed. Aside from the occasional toe stubby on the outside legs my only issue is some of the wood planks creak and make noise when I roll over in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rango360

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, Pretty Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it! Took me about 45 minutes to set up, but could be done much faster with someone to help. Assembly itself was easy, and it looks great. Maybe it was my own confusion, but it doesn't seem to add as much storage space below as I thought it did. It adds plenty, but definitely not "14 inches." Overall, though, I enjoy it, and I'm glad I bought it, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was the least expensive bed frame on Amazon, but I am very happy with the product. It is nicer than my roommate's bed frame, which was more money than this one. This frame came in pieces, but I was provided with tools in the box for assembly. It took me about 44 minutes to assemble the entire bed frame. There is a nice amount of storage space under the bed, too. I definitely upgraded my room when I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Smart, Just Wish it was Lower
customer_reviews.text: Twenty years ago, I could have assembled this thing in 30 minutes, but it took me an hour and a half because I get tired and frustrated easily. But it's an easy, smart assembly. This is a solid, snug bed frame. I just wish it was about eight inches lower. Maybe offer two models in the future? This regular model and a low-profile alternative?
customer_reviews.author: Rougy

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This frame was so easy to put together my teenager put it together in about 30 minutes. It did arrive a day late but that wasn't a real big deal. The highth of this frame is great and perfect for underneath storage. This is pretty sturdy with eight legs offset from the corner instead of one leg in each corner. The frame doesn't seem to squeak or make much noise at all while shifting your weight around when laying on the mattress. We give this high recommendation with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Average man

customer_reviews.title: Already started squeaking within a month
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straight forward and can easily be done alone. Build quality isn't the greatest, but understandable considering the price. As others have mentioned, this doesn't have the best lateral stability. You can feel lots of movements when getting in and out of bed. Plenty of space underneath to fit square foot bins. Within one month, I've started to notice a bit of squeaking when moving on the bed. Probably would be a good idea to apply some blue Loctite on the threads of the bolts. This would be a good bed frame for a small child or a guest room, but I wouldn't trust the longevity of this for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: H.I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Took a very short time to put together (less than 30 min) and was super easy. My 20 yr old daughter put together while I watched. Purchased to replace bulky full sized bed frame in guest room. It is super sturdy so no moving or squicking. I have a pretty heavy and thick serta gel cool mattress so maybe a little higher than others (about 12 to 14" thick). Spacing of wood boards under mattress is perfect so no sagging possible. Love that there's no headboard or footboard so easy to put anywhere in room and use wall decor above it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look else where. This isn't Worth the time I wasted waiting for half  a frame
customer_reviews.text: Finally recieved the frame a week late. After having no tracking up date for the last 6 days it finally arrived in half the box it left the factory in originally. Bix had holes in it and tape everywhere. No hardware (nuts and bolts), missing corner brackets and no directions. Not that I need the directions when really I only recieved half of what I paid for. Definetly returning.
customer_reviews.author: Fati Gued Out

customer_reviews.title: Needs better padding on the legs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to build (keep an eye on the orientation of the legs as you put them on) and is high enough to slide under storage boxes (I use printer paper boxes or file boxes). It's very light to move. However - if you're on hardwood or laminate, double-pad the legs, especially the center leg. The rubber tips on the legs are insufficient and when I moved my bed frame after about two months I found the center leg had scraped a patch in my laminate floor. Just put down some felt furniture pads under the legs, especially the center.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tunney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy assembly and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: very well made frame, it is sturdy and well made. I was able to put this frame together within 30 minutes or less alone. 2 people would have made it easier, but not necessary. The natural wood slats are much nicer that my previous metal platform frame which had a metal springy type platform. I used a box spring and a 12” mattress. Overall , this is a well made, easy to assemble, no squeaks or unsteadiness. I have had this platform for several weeks and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Monterey Snow

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this frame after much angst -- for a new foam mattress ... which is a first also for me. The number of positive reviews convinced me to try it. It took my husband and I only 45 minutes to setup, and it wouldn't have taken us that long, except I'm not good with picture instructions. We were very impressed that all the parts were there and everything accurately aligned without any struggles. In fact, I just ordered another one for our second bed. We'll try it tonight with the new mattress but I feel confident it will be extremely supportive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a box spring
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't like dragging box springs around, and have an old futon mattress made of foam that I threw some memory foam on. I got this Frame so that I could put things underneath my bed. It has a lot of clearance and you can fit tons of stuff under it. The way they designed it there are no bars on the corners, so I avoid stubbing my toes every time I walk around my bed. If you've ever done that you know how appreciative it is to not have to deal with it! Stubbing your toe on those bars hurts more than getting bit by the rabid mouse you try to save from the cat.
customer_reviews.author: CocaNilla

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and very solid!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to accommodate my very heavy 16" memory foam/ latex mattress I also purchased here on Amazon. So far, so good. The base seems pretty solid. There are no squeaks or noises. My husband put it together while I was out of town, and he said it was simple, and he has no issues such as missing pieces, etc. I love the height of the bed since there is plenty of room to put storage containers underneath. I also like that there are no legs at the corners where you would generally kick and stub your toes! Great product, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great frame & great company!
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is awesome and so is the company! My husband raved about how clear the assembly instructions were and how well organized all the parts and tools were. He said these were the best he has ever seen when it comes to putting anything together. Once assembled, the frame was sturdy and comfortable. There was plenty of room for storage underneath. I never imagined that I would be so happy to write a review for a bedframe, but this one is truly great!
customer_reviews.author: Sony H

customer_reviews.title: Recommended buy.  Great product.  Great value.  Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy Assembly with ratchet tool they provide. (Look for it at the bottom of the box) Edges have rounded corners 👍. Excellent height for storage underneath. I will store luggage and odd items and will add storage bins for quick access to stuff. The wooden slats provide excellent support and have a few strips of double back tape to stop the mattress from shifting. I have purchased a different brand with metal slats that had to be assembled. The wooden slats roll out for quick ez installation and provide excellent uniform support.
customer_reviews.author: Spagheddie

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was not as easy as other frames. I'm used to just pulling out the legs and putting a few washers on however, I'm hoping that means this frame will be a little sturdier. It took me alone, probably an hour. I added some felt circles to the side that will touch the wall so it doesn't get scuffed up. The slats are pretty close together though which is nice, will help the mattress last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a big guy and I am not small. Holds the both of us very well. Really easy to assemble, do reccomend 2 people, but could do it with 1. Tools handy. Mattress has stayed in place without the tape. Can fit 1 long thin tote under, couldnt double stack. However does have enough room to stack loose objects on top if needed.
customer_reviews.author: tmastergamer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely noisy & very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a bad purchase. It creaks and wobbles endlessly. I am a light sleeper and have the hardest time staying asleep on this bed because it creaks and wobbles with the slightest movement. Can't return it now since it is out of the return period. Bed started creaking within 5 days of using it. I would not recommend this to anyone. I ordered this bed since I like Zinus products, I have 2 bed frames(King & Queen with headboard) from them which I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Parimala

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Bought damaged box that claimed it had all parts. Everything in like-new, but no hardware or corner pieces to attach sides to ends. Did online chat. They emailed a request for PDF of invoice. Sent it. No response. Finally called Zinus customer support, which is in India, and they said they don't support open box sales and they won't sell me the hardware. Backnto Amazon this goes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it seems to hold up extremely well, when moving it with a mattress on top you just have to take some extra time and move it carefully. it made my not be kid proof if your kids jump up and down on the bed but for an adult it definitely is very stable. The welding joints could be slightly better but seem to be of a quality that will last for a good while as long as you're careful with moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schemmel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Nobody wants all those box springs anymore. I have a heavy, king-size mattress and the box springs were saggy. The mattress wasn't old enough to replace but my back was killing me, all of a sudden, and I figured the springs had to go. I checked reviews and decided to try this base. What could it hurt? It arrived quickly and was easy to put together. It seemed sort of sturdy but I had my doubts. Six months later, I have two in my house, now and couldn't be happier. It's supportive, quiet and perfect. You could spend more for a bed frame but why would you? A great buy and an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: sharmie

customer_reviews.title: love the height and underneath storage
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8-inch double spring mattress that was $80-ish dollars. It was on the floor for a few months. I was looking for a slat-frame that didn't need a box spring for under $100 and came across this beauty. Zinus was a life-saver! I have a beautiful, clean mattress; a bed-bug cover; a completely waterproof cover; and a weighted blanket with some queen-sized pillows. I've had the best sleep longed for! My room is pretty much compact and set up for tiny living and this frame left me plenty of walking room.
customer_reviews.author: Amia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking to purchase. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a simple study platform for a full size memory foam mattress. Nice design, simple and seemed easy to do the assembly and I am a klutz. Fits the mattress perfectly and great for our guest bedroom. The ratchet tool did make the over all set up go much faster. I highly suggest the bed frame for any room where you need a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Value Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer care
customer_reviews.text: I can not stress how easy this is to put together! I did it alone in less than 30mins, sturdy and great price. They give you extra parts and accessories/tools. Their customer service was on top, giving even cute freebies such as note cards to use. Highly recommended and would 100% buy from again
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Five star bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Light weight in the box, very easy to essemble. All tools included. Very easy to understand instructions. Took 45 minutes to essemble, taking my time. Very sturdy, and quite. Fits mattress perfect. I'll give a six month update on this product. Pretty sure I will be loving it as much then as now. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This a great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is fantastic for a teen's room or a first time apartment renter. it is light weight and can be easily moved by just folding the frame legs down and is light enough to move by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Fong

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble. Great frame.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed frame. It arrived today and didn’t take long at all to put together. Everything needed was included, even a little ratchet! Made it so easy to assemble, even with a 1 year old running around. It’s a great height to put storage tubs underneath. I have a 10” lucid gel memory foam mattress on it which I also got from here. Works perfectly together.
customer_reviews.author: camille

customer_reviews.title: Maybe sub 175lbs.
customer_reviews.text: If you like a hammock, this may be perfect. At 225 and 6ft the slats bow enough to allow the mattress to sag. Again, if you are looking for under bed storage and you want to cover this with a sheet or 2 of plywood, this would be great. If i had a way to transport plywood, i would not have purchased a bed foundation
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Don't be put off by the sheer number of parts. They thought of everything in packaging this, even spare parts and a ratcheting allen wrench. From the soft rubber tips on the legs to the plastic caps on the slats to the curved connectors for the tops and sides, this was designed for ease of assembly and protection (floors and shins). We use this in a guest bedroom so it won't get a ton of use, but I would get one for every spare bedroom in the house. (A bedskirt covers the barebones look.)
customer_reviews.author: Pam G

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for an european syle bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for $38 from the returns. It came basically unscalted and was one of the best deals ever. It is very european style of bed frame, which gives you a very firm sensation if combined with a firm mattress (like sleeping on the floor). It is very good if you suffer of back pain due to e.g., seating not in the correct position or sitting for too long. It survived multiple tests with me and my gf on top, so it should work for an heavy person (at least up to 300 lb); more than that it is not advised.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Tomasini

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase took some stars away for instructions and cheap parts on slats
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a base for a twin 8inch foam mattress. The slats provide adequate support so you do not need box springs or a board. This is well made but it is not suited for jumping on or I would guess over 250lbs. Took 2 stars away because instruction are terrible (when you build it pay attention to the direction of the side frames make sure 2 legs are on same end and the rubber on the center frame is face up) and the connectors for the slats to the frame are thin cheap plastic and will definetly need replacing down the road.
customer_reviews.author: ErnieT3

customer_reviews.title: and night one was great but as days turned to weeks it became very ...
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited for this base, and night one was great but as days turned to weeks it became very squeaky and loud, so much so we would wake each other up if we turned over in bed. I even tried reinforcing the posts at their connection point, it helped for a little and then it was just as bad, to the garbage it went :(
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: SO loud. ugh
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this thing a few months, and every tiny move we make, the bed is SO loud. We are getting our original frame back which was equally cheap and required assembly, and it's much better. I do like the height of it, which gave it a star, and the fact that it is holding us up still gave it the other star. Other than that -- a few months in -- i can't wait to throw it in the garbage when we get our furniture after selling our other house!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Pullem

customer_reviews.title: I love the height of this bed because I can place ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing about this a year later. This bed as served me well in college. I love the height of this bed because I can place several bin boxes under the frame. If you are looking for an effective space saver, this is for you! The only con is the thin wooden planks. I nearly broke one of these when I moved. Be sure to take them out before moving. Surprisingly these wooden planks held up my mattress pretty good because they are secured in each slot on the frame as seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ms J

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great platform. Holds a foam mattress just fine. Light weight and seems pretty sturdy! My only issue was the plugs that go into the bottom of the legs. They kept falling out, so I just took them out. But otherwise it was a great find! Pretty good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Alix P

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so easy to assemble it was FUN! The tools made it easy. It is sturdy. I have a full 12" mattress on it. I love it. The box it came in was slender. and was easy to pick up. I want to buy another one. It came with spare parts as well. Easy directions.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is so easy to put together my 11 year old son was able to put it together on his own lol (i still helped). Iv only had it for 2 days but seems very sturdy. The height of the bed is perfect for me and lots of space under the bed. I would recommend this bed and i’m going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tran S

customer_reviews.title: Frames arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The first frame arrived with the end of the box open and the frame protruding, with damage to the frame. The frame was replaced by Zinus quickly, but the second frame was also damaged. The box was fine, but most of the metal bars had dents the size of a quarter or larger and the finish was scraped off in places. There were a lot of damaged areas -- had to be due to rough handling at the factory. That should not be the case with a new purchase. I didn't return the second frame because I wanted to get my bed set up!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: This base is so sturdy and perfect for our memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: This base is so sturdy and perfect for our memory foam mattress. Both my husband and I are large people and it's amazing. I also love that there is room underneath to store items since we use this at our recreational trailer and space is somewhat limited. I highly recommend this product and you certainly can't beat the cost. There were a couple of reviews that I read where they had issues with the assembly of the item but we didn't have any issues whatsoever. Everything was there and everything went together perfectly. :)
customer_reviews.author: DeviousWitch

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, practical and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The rest of my bedroom furniture is fairly polished, but I wanted a stable bed, and this delivered! You can stuff as many things as you need under the bed, I'm considering putting a bedskirt on it to hide the irony ness in my very girly room, but it doesn't actually draw any attention to itself.
customer_reviews.author: Suna Y

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit iffy about buying this online, but I am so happy that I did! I absolutely LOVE this bed frame! It's extremely sturdy for a rambunctious 8yr old who loves to jump on things, including our large dogs! Plenty of storage space to put boxes underneath. Super easy to assemble! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie & Sam Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect platform for any mattress.high enough to store items underneath. Sturdy, easy to assemble and I would recommend this to anyone. We use it for our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Enterprises Sedona

customer_reviews.title: I moved across the country and needed a bed. Lucky to have found this great frame.
customer_reviews.text: I can't go back to any other kind of frame. It's liberating to have a ton of storage under my mattress and then see only a mattress. I used to have a box spring that was creaky, and why bother with such nonsense? Why pay more for a more involved frame?
customer_reviews.author: Radomir Jordanovic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Being an 'old-school' box springs and mattress girl I purchased this, and a 12" memory foam mattress for my grand-daughter's room, which is only used for summer vacation and Christmas vacation and thinking it would be strong enough for her very petite size and minimal use. I am amazed at how easily it assembled, the stability and the support, not to mention the storage area underneath that it allows. I have layed on it myself and my husband as well, who is 260 pounds. Fantastic purchase. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 52 dollars I ever spend
customer_reviews.text: Best 52-ish dollars I ever spend on a bed frame. Don't let the plastic parts for the wood mattress support fool you when you open the package. Bought a full size frame, easy to assembled as long as you pay attention to all the screws. Metal legs, metal frame all around with smooth surface wood support that won't damage your mattress. This is a top-notch quality bed frame for a low budget price.
customer_reviews.author: Robb C

product_meta.title: Zinus Cynthia 14 Inch MyEuro SmartBase / Wooden Slat / Mattress Foundation / Platform Bed Frame / Box Spring Replacement, Queen
product_meta.description:
Size:QueenThe Next Generation Bed Frame - The SmartBase MyEuro Wooden Slat Mattress Foundation by Zinus. The MyEuro SmartBase eliminates the need for a box spring as your memory foam, spring or latex mattress should be placed directly on the SmartBase. Uniquely designed for optimum support and durability, the strong steel structure and wooden slats provide mattress support, multiple points of contact with the floor ensure stability and durability. With plastic caps to protect your floors, the MyEuro SmartBase is well designed for ease of use. Worry free 5-year limited warranty. Another comfort innovation from Zinus. Pioneering comfort.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Next Generation Bed Frame - The SmartBase MyEuro Wooden Slat Mattress Foundation by Zinus. The MyEuro SmartBase eliminates the need for a box spring as your memory foam, spring or latex mattress should be placed directly on the SmartBase. Uniquely designed for optimum support and durability, the strong steel structure and wooden slats provide mattress support, multiple points of contact with the floor ensure stability and durability. With plastic caps to protect your floors, the MyEuro SmartBase is well designed for ease of use. Worry free 5-year limited warranty. Another comfort innovation from Zinus. Pioneering comfort.
feature_bullets: Complete mattress support system - replacing both the frame & box spring
Easy to assemble in minutes / no tools required / not compatible with head board brackets
14 wooden slats, center support bar and seven foldable legs provide strength and stability
Foam padded tape is added to the steel frame for noise-free use
12.5 inches of clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,164 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
